subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Winning a Game 7 on the road for the third time this postseason, Los Angeles outlasted Chicago, 5-4, in overtime and advanced to play the Rangers in the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Winning a Game 7 on the road for the third time this postseason, Los Angeles outlasted Chicago, 5-4, in overtime and advanced to play the Rangers in the Stanley Cup finals.
